title: 8.1 patch takes for ever...
body:
i downloaded the game and signed up then waiting for the patch to finish.... it will take more than 845122 houres!!! what should i do!!!! it says mor than 17800 mb  need to download!!!! help plz...
my email:
sma3il.al79re@hotmail.com

replies.body: You might be able to get that patch downloaded a bit faster by using a wired connection or [**adjusting your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5).

its the same problem with the wired connection..the problem is not the speed..its the size that should be downloaded!!!
you mean change my adsl router dns to 8.8.8.8??
thnx alot for helping

Yup, you should be able to change some of your network settings for the DNS steps. Use [**this article**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) if you need some help with those steps!
